word:
Brethren and sisters, pray as you have never prayed before that the Holy Spirit may come into this meeting, and that every heart may be softened. There are not simply two or three cases of division and misunderstanding among us. There are many who are cherishing distrust and suspicion. They have watched for failings in others, even while they had many failings 


                    -267- 

themselves. Had they watched themselves, they would have found that they were cherishing a spirit which was not of Christ.
